column1: consent,"I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.","Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.","categorical","Yes"
prolific_id,"Please enter your Prolific ID (this is required to receive payment).","Unique Prolific participant identifier.","text","Free text"

ai_tool_use_frequency,"How often do you use digital or AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search) in your daily life?","Frequency of using AI-powered or digital tools in daily life.","categorical",""
hours_online_per_day,"On average, how many hours do you spend online each day? (self-estimate)","Estimated number of hours spent online per day.","numeric","Self-estimated hours per day"
ai_primary_use_cases,"What do you use AI for most often? (Select all that apply)","Primary use cases of AI tools (multi-select).","multi_select",""
ai_confidence,"In general, how confident do you feel using AI tools?","Self-rated confidence using AI tools.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not confident at all → 7 = Extremely confident)"
ai_health_advice_risk,"AI providing health or wellbeing advice.","Perceived risk associated with AI giving health or wellbeing advice.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not risky at all → 7 = Extremely risky)"

ai_finance_recommendations_risk,"AI making recommendations about money or finance.","Perceived risk of AI giving financial recommendations.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not risky at all → 7 = Extremely risky)"
ai_work_influence_risk,"AI influencing work-related decisions.","Perceived risk associated with AI influencing work decisions.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not risky at all → 7 = Extremely risky)"

ai_interacting_with_children_risk,"AI interacting with children or young people.","Perceived risk associated with AI interacting with children.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not risky at all → 7 = Extremely risky)"
ai_inaccurate_info_risk,"AI generating information that might be inaccurate.","Perceived risk of AI generating inaccurate information.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not risky at all → 7 = Extremely risky)"

ai_data_based_opinions_risk,"AI forming opinions about someone based on personal data.","Perceived risk of AI forming opinions using personal data.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not risky at all → 7 = Extremely risky)"

ai_independent_small_actions_risk,"An AI tool taking small actions independently (e.g. drafting content without asking).","Perceived risk of autonomous AI actions.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not risky at all → 7 = Extremely risky)"

ai_decisions_without_approval_risk,"An AI tool making decisions for you when you haven't given explicit approval.","Perceived risk of AI making decisions without approval.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not risky at all → 7 = Extremely risky)"

ai_memory_usage_risk,"An AI tool remembering past conversations and using them to guide new ones.","Perceived risk associated with AI using conversational memory.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not risky at all → 7 = Extremely risky)"
ai_unexpected_actions_risk,"An AI tool suggesting actions you did not expect or ask for.","Perceived risk from unexpected AI suggestions.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not risky at all → 7 = Extremely risky)"

ai_inconsistent_responses_unease,"I feel uneasy when an AI tool responds inconsistently to the same question.","Unease caused by inconsistent AI responses.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree → 7 = Strongly agree)"

ai_tone_changes_reliability_concern,"Sudden changes in tone or behaviour from AI make me question its reliability.","Concern about AI reliability due to tone/behaviour shifts.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree → 7 = Strongly agree)"

ai_prefer_predictability,"I prefer AI tools that behave predictably, even if they are less powerful.","Preference for predictability in AI behaviour.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree → 7 = Strongly agree)"
ai_emotional_tone_risk,"AI talking in a highly emotional or personal way.","Comfort level with emotionally expressive AI behaviour.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Very uncomfortable → 7 = Very comfortable)"
ai_personalisation_risk,"AI using personal details to tailor responses.","Comfort level with AI personalisation.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Very uncomfortable → 7 = Very comfortable)"
ai_strong_opinions_risk,"AI giving strong opinions about sensitive topics.","Comfort level with AI expressing strong opinions.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Very uncomfortable → 7 = Very comfortable)"
ai_overconfidence_risk,"AI becoming overly confident in its answers.","Comfort level with overconfident AI behaviour.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Very uncomfortable → 7 = Very comfortable)"

ai_overlook_risks_for_convenience,"I sometimes overlook potential risks because AI tools make my tasks easier.","Tendency to overlook risks due to AI convenience.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree → 7 = Strongly agree)"

ai_convenience_tradeoff_acceptance,"The convenience of AI is worth accepting some level of uncertainty.","Willingness to accept uncertainty in exchange for AI convenience.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree → 7 = Strongly agree)"

ai_guidance_stressful_moment_risk,"An AI tool offering guidance during a stressful moment (e.g., conflict, crisis, decision pressure).","Comfort level with AI guidance during stressful moments.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not comfortable at all → 7 = Very comfortable)"

ai_proactive_risk_warning_risk,"An AI tool proactively warning you about potential risks in your behaviour.","Comfort level with AI issuing proactive warnings.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not comfortable at all → 7 = Very comfortable)"

ai_predicting_future_choices_risk,"An AI tool predicting your future choices based on past interactions.","Comfort level with AI predicting future behaviour.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not comfortable at all → 7 = Very comfortable)"
expect_ai_to_become_safer,"I expect AI systems to become safer over time.","Expectation that AI will improve in safety.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree → 7 = Strongly agree)"
future_ai_concern,"I am more concerned about future AI than the AI we have today.","Concern level about future AI development.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree → 7 = Strongly agree)"
double_check_ai_info,"I double-check AI information with other sources.","Frequency of verifying AI-generated information.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Never → 7 = Always)"
avoid_topics_with_ai,"I avoid certain questions or topics with AI because I'm unsure how it will respond.","Frequency of avoiding topics with AI.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Never → 7 = Always)"
reduce_ai_use_unpredictable,"I reduce how much I use AI when it feels unpredictable or confusing.","Frequency of reducing AI use when unpredictable.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Never → 7 = Always)"

ai_safety_open_comment,"Is there anything else you want to share about how you feel regarding AI safety or risk? (Optional)","Open-ended feedback about AI safety or perceived risk.","text","Free text"

trust_ai_to_act_in_best_interests,"How much do you trust AI systems to act in your best interests?","Level of trust in AI acting in users’ best interests.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not at all → 7 = Completely)"

what_matters_most,"How clear do you feel about what matters most in your life right now?","Self-rated clarity about personal values and priorities.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not clear at all → 7 = Extremely clear)"

digital_life_effect_on_focus,"How much does modern digital life affect your ability to focus, decide, or think clearly?","Impact of digital life on cognitive clarity.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Not at all → 7 = Very strongly)"

feelings_about_ai_in_decision_making,"How do you feel about the growing role of AI in everyday decision-making?","Emotional evaluation of AI’s role in everyday decisions.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Very negative → 7 = Very positive)"
ai_values_multi,"Which values do you believe AI systems should reflect? (select up 3)","Values participants believe AI systems should reflect (multi-select).","multi_select",""
age_group,"What is your age group?","Participant age group.","categorical",""
gender,"Which of the following best describes your gender?","Participant gender identity.","categorical",""
country,"Country of residence.","Participant country of residence.","categorical",""
education_level,"What is your highest level of education?","Highest level of education completed.","categorical",""
work_status,"Which of the following best describes your current work status?","Participant employment or occupational status.","categorical",""
emotional_wellbeing,"How would you describe your general emotional wellbeing?","Self-rated emotional wellbeing.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Very poor → 7 = Excellent)"
